title: The One About Working Together
description:
This week Bob and Monét argue about which coast has better dining, Bob presents us with his stance on pizza party etiquette, and Monét confronts Bob about raising their voice at a tour manager in the early years of their working relationship.
See Monét and Bob on tour this summer by going to bobandmonet.com !!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
